scripts.compile: npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.mjs
scripts.compile:win: npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.mjs --win
scripts.compile:mac: npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.mjs --mac
scripts.publish: npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.mjs --publish always
scripts.publish:github: npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.mjs --publish always
scripts.init: npm run create-renderer && npm run integrate-renderer && npm install
